Name: HMS Kent
Displacement:
9,850 long tons (10,010 t) (standard load)
13,520 long tons (13,740 t) (deep load)
Propulsion:
4 shafts, Parsons geared steam turbines
8 Admiralty 3-drum water-tube boilers
Armament:
4 × twin 8-inch (203 mm) guns
4 × single QF 4-inch (102 mm) Mk V anti-aircraft (AA) guns
4 × single 2-pounder (40 mm) AA guns
2 × quadruple 21 inch (533 mm) torpedo tubes
Armour:
Belt: 1 in (25 mm)
Decks: 1.375–1.5 in (34.9–38.1 mm)
Barbettes: 1 in (25 mm)
Turrets: 1 in (25 mm)
Bulkheads: 1 in (25 mm)
Magazines: 2–4.375 in (50.8–111.1 mm)
